website_summaries.verdict: One of the only all-natural products to ease suffering from  poison ivy rashes and other skin ailments.
pros: Reviewers love that ingredients – which include herbs, beeswax and tea tree oil – are all found in nature
Also provides relief for other skin conditions such as shingles, diaper rash, bug bites, and burns
cons: Some reviewers say it's not powerful enough to tackle extreme cases of poison ivy

customer_reviews.title: It worked for my kids poison ivy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after my son ended up with a major case of poison ivy on his face. The steroids the doctor gave him just weren't working fast enough. Someone had told me about this product and it definitely didn't disappoint us. It quickly soothed his puffiness and itchiness. Within 1 day there was a huge difference. Swelling was down and he wasn't trying to tear his face off. It also worked quickly to clear up all the bumps. 4 days later you wouldn't even know he had poison ivy. Will most definitely make sure I keep this product on hand at all times in case of future outbreaks.
customer_reviews.author: Treasa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for post burn treatment
customer_reviews.text: A pitcher with boiling water in it exploded in front of me, while it was sitting on my countertop, giving me second and third degree burns on 15% of my body. I treated my burn at home with Colloidal silver and have been using this on the burn area that covers my right leg, now that the new skin has covered over where the blisters were. It does an amazing job of moisturizing the skin and reducing the pain and redness that I've had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothes and heals bites and more
customer_reviews.text: After moving from San Diego to Charleston, SC this year, I'm getting bites of all kinds. Fleas. Mosquitos. Spiders. No-see-ums. This jewelweed salve is a lifesaver. Instead of itching, I just rub this on bites (or rashes or poison ivy/oak) and in a minute, the itchiness leaves. I reapply if I feel it again. The bites disappear in a day or so... making way for new ones. This is terrific. I carry it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L Shields

customer_reviews.title: best ointment ever used.
customer_reviews.text: product does everything stated and more. if any mussles are hurting from over extended reach, cramps, or torn out of place. the product does speed the healing process. just one thing would make it a perfect product, by adding some herbs to discourage insects would be extremely great.
customer_reviews.author: allen stancius

customer_reviews.title: Heals skin!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to help my skin heal after getting poison ivy. I started using it after the rash was no longer oozing. It seems to aid the healing process way more than just using regular moisturizers. There is a decent amount in the jar ( a small glass canning jar) so I now use it as a hand creme and it works well. It is not too greasy and seems to help well with hands that dry out from gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Marciniak

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for poison ivy and a great moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I had poison ivy really, really, really, really bad...it looked like I was burned. I was on steroids for a month. I ordered this salve because despite the steroids, I still had "breakthrough" itching and hydrocortisone, calamine lotion, and aloe were not helping much. This salve cut the itching almost immediately and was so soothing. It moisturizes really well. There are areas on my arm where I'm probably going to have some scarring from the poison ivy but this salve has kept the area supple, so I think the scarring will eventually fade. I am planning on using it as a moisturizer for dry skin this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Genifer

customer_reviews.title: Worked
customer_reviews.text: Husband was battling poison ivy for a long while. I finally said enough of his remedies that were not working and ordered this, as I had no jewel weed. Jewelweed for the win. Poison Ivy gone, like magic.
customer_reviews.author: Karwyn

customer_reviews.title: It works to reduce itxhibg
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well to reduce the itching associated with poison ivy. I bought some as gifts for friends who have PI growing rampant in their yards. 🌞
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: Decent and effective for my itchy skin. I couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent and effective for my itchy skin. I couldn't believe how quickly it works to relieve itchy skin. Very dense balm, and this will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad because he has extremely dry hands from working outside all day. He told me he couldn't find a product that would give him relief, so I read reviews and mailed him some of this salve from Amazon. He said it cleared up his hands!! I also bought some for my young daughters for mosquito bites and it has worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Blasi

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product!
customer_reviews.text: I had poison ivy and nothing was helping. Wow!!!!! The slave started working within hours. I thought the poison ivy sites were going to scar. After using the slave for a few days its almost gone! Thank you for making such a Great natural product!
customer_reviews.author: Luwana Lash

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Life saver for poison ivy. I had a horrendous case of poison ivy....this was the only thing that gave me enough relief so I could sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better thn anything I have ever used before I like this product.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry skin or drying out skin!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and works for eczema itch and poison ivy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped with another order. Really helps heal problem areas.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Works for me and my poor little dog that got a little bit of poison ivy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blue Water

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Just like the real plant. Get bit by a mosquito and put this on. It stops the itch and I forget you got bit!!! Totally worth the cost. I'm not allergic to poison ivy so not sure of the effectiveness of that.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I make sure to have this salve on hand. Great for all kinds of things!

customer_reviews.title: Dependable, reliable, A+ sellers. Will buy from again
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described, came promptly, really does work wonders with poison oak, Ivy, and sumac

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome on bites stops the itching. Thank you buying it again

customer_reviews.title: Would use again
customer_reviews.text: Used jewelweed balm on my poison ivy. It relieved the itch and helped heal faster

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Jar arrived broken. Scent isn't pleasant, but I want buying it for that either.

customer_reviews.title: Less oder
customer_reviews.text: It works well on bites and inching the smell is a little stronger than I would like

customer_reviews.title: Should be a staple in every medicine cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this directly from Creation Farm online and am delighted that I could just add it to my Amazon order when my husband stole my jar. This is a staple in our medicine cabinet. All ingredients are pure and not synthetic. This salve is gentle and effective for all kinds of conditions and smells good to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: This did not help my poison ivy rash at all.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Reader

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I am putting this on the backs of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I am putting this on the backs of my arms where I have had acne problems. I am getting married in a few months and would like to clear up the bumps and scabs. I feel that this has defiantly helped sooth the area and aided in the healing process. It does have a slight smell, but not strong at all. This product will last a long time- there is a lot in the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Jacklyn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wrong ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients on the jar were not the ingredients posted in the listing
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product, but it did absolutely nothing for my poison ivy. Would not purchase it again. No good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: karen mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: maybe made it worse.
customer_reviews.text: I think I was allergic to this, but it was hard to tell since I already had a poison ivy rash, but in any case, it didn't help, maybe made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Delorey

customer_reviews.title: I love Creation Farms!
customer_reviews.text: Dear Creation Farms, Thank you for making this Jewelweed slave. My very angry, tired and frustrated skin eats it up when I use it as a moisturizer. My children's super sensitive skin heals within hours when it is used on a bite. My pimples disappear and my wrinkles are leaving and....Creation Farms...I think....I love you. That is all.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. R

customer_reviews.title: Great Salve. Better than Most.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I get terrible poison ivy, and jewelweed is the only thing that helps. This one is better than most in that it not only helps the Poison Ivy to heal faster, but it also helps with the itch. In my experience, many jewelweed salves do not actually help with the itch.
customer_reviews.author: TurboFantasticMan

customer_reviews.title: Works better than taking steroids.
customer_reviews.text: Works better than going to the doctor and taking steroids. Why don't they prescribe this instead?
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: after 2 days it was much better and after a week completely gone
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well. My wrist got really swollen, rashy and itchy. Poison Ivy remedies from a drug store didn't help at all so I was miserable for about a week. Than my order with the salve came and I noticed quick improvement, after 2 days it was much better and after a week completely gone. I'll be getting more to have just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Elzbieta Plonska

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased w/this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased w/this purchase, the value and it was effective for more than poison ivy. We used this first for a poison ivy outbreak on my son's face. It was soothing and it helped ease itching, we used in conjunction with a poison ivy spray. We also used this for healing a tattoo (worked great) and some bug bites and scrapes. It's a really generous sized jar.
customer_reviews.author: CCC+c

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer. The Jewelweed is a great product for hives, rashes, insect stings and itchy things in general. Works really well on bee or wasp stings. I haven’t tried it on poison ivy or oak, we don’t have much of that here. Works well on diaper rash or heat rash. Very soothing. I tried a different brand but didn’t work near as well as this. It smells green, not pleasant but not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: dmccary

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! Great consistency fantastic smelk and it can go ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, This product is awesome! Great consistency fantastic smelk and it can go almost anywhere on the body doesn’t burn it is a perfect product I love it thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful
customer_reviews.text: Both the odor and texture are dreadful. It smells like rotting weeds soaked in petroleum. Would have been cheaper to just put Vaseline on my hands and not smell as bad. Wow, was this a bad purchase. Puppy came to be patted and jumped away from my hand and sort of growled. Very first time I've ever heard him growl.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: COVID 19 RASH
customer_reviews.text: A family member has been hit hard by COVID 19. He was finally on the road the road 5o recovery, thank God, when he was hit with a COVID 19 rash. It came on fast and his body was in welts. He said the itching was intense. I grabbed this jar, which I had purchased for other purposes, and slathered it on his skin. Within half an hour he was able to sleep and by the next morning 90% of the rash was gone. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: IT REALLY WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Speaking from someone who gets poison ivy and oak from the air, I usually have to get a steroid shot and pill regiment every April this stuff really eases the itch and works!!!! Life Saver
customer_reviews.author: TRHenry

customer_reviews.title: makes Poision Ivy bearable
customer_reviews.text: really helps with rash, dry skin, itching and general discomfort, not sure it shorten the duration, but really help with the discomfort
customer_reviews.author: JCJRCH

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this product, but unfortunately I was a little disappointed. I ordered it for my sensitive skin and poison ivy relief. It felt good going on, but I did not notice that it helped reduce my itchiness, redness, or relief. I wasn’t crazy about the scent. The packaging is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Raine Cline

customer_reviews.title: Non invasive gel/cream with anti fungal/ anti bacterial properties.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for my dogs belly on a bug bite, and it seemed to help the skin. Also used it for a rash on myself and soothed it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Yuga

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on poison!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I have had poison for over a week. I tried everything. Cortisone cream. Calmoseptine. Baking powder paste. Apple cider vinegar. It helped with the itch but nothing was making it go away. I used this for one day. The next day I noticed a remarkable difference. The poison is smaller and not as read. I will never use anything else for poison ivy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Got poison ivy and used this several times a day. It was very effecitive in helping me not itch and burn. Purchased more.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Neutralizes itching from mosquito bites within seconds. Clears them up completely within a few days. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Collins Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt do what it claims to
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't do everything it says it does. It's ok at best. Doesnt help heal everything under the sun.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca tibble

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for mild cases of poison ivy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a natural remedy for poison ivy which I encounter every summer. Sometimes I get a severe case that only an injection will help but this worked well on my milder encounters. Soothing to the skin. I even used it on a couple of scratches I had and it appeared to reduce the scarring.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the neutral smell of the product as well as it's effectiveness. I had a severe reaction to Carolina Horsenettle and this balm helped calm down my red, itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Parsons Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Works for poison ivy
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff it works for bug bite scrapes and poison ivy

customer_reviews.title: Good Balm
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a good balm. I have used occasionally.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on every body part! My hands look 10 years younger too.

customer_reviews.title: Better than anything from the drug store
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that works on my poison ivy. Better than anything from the drug store.

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: Best skin healer I've ever found. Family member suffers with chronic itching in face, this soothes and heals, also reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: smh...
customer_reviews.text: No Reins Jewelweed Salve is way way better if u have poison ivy. Speaking from 1st hand experience. Sorry Creation Farms but with your product I am literally applying it almost every 30 min it seems like. The poison ivy itch just won't go away like it did with your competitor. With No Reins Jewelweed Salve it worked in just a couple min & lasted for quite a while. I just didn't get that with your jewelweed salve.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients listed on the jar have nothing in common with the ones on the seller's description!
